<jobs>
    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Flexible Part-Time Pet Care in West County]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
We are expanding our team and currently hiring additional part-time, flexible Pet Sitters and Dog Walkers in the west St. Louis County area. Services are provided in the owner's home and driving will be required within the area south of Page, west of 270, and north of 44.
  

  

  

  
This is a flexible as-needed position and includes day, evening, weekend, and holiday opportunities. Perfect as a second job for some extra spending money or for retirees! Midday dog walking opportunities are also available.
  

  
Required Skills and Experience:
  

  

  
+ Pet Care Experience - general knowledge of multiple species
  

  
+ Must have the ability to work with all breeds and sizes
  

  
+ Ability to work independently with minimal to no supervision
  

  
+ Ability to safely lift 50 pounds and walk at a brisk pace for 30 min at a time, multiple times a day
  

  
+ Have your own functional and reliable transportation
  

  
+ Have a newer smartphone (iOS 9 or newer and Android 4.1 or newer) and a home computer with internet access 
  

  

  
Responsible for the following:
  

  

  
+ Providing care to animals (mainly dogs and cats) including walking, feeding, and other tasks as needed.
  

  
+ Communication with the central office
  

  
+ Continuing education provided
  

  
+ Providing client communications, education, and follow-up
  

  
+ Participates as a team member with company events/programs
  

  

  
Flexible PT scheduling and Company 401K.
  

  
Evening and weekend compensation differential.
  

  
We will not consider anyone for this position who is currently employed as a caregiver for another company, themselves or as an online service provider and wishes to remain so.  Applicants should be over age 18 with a high school diploma or equivalent and able to clear a thorough background check.
  

  
BE SURE TO CHECK YOUR SPAM FOLDER FOR EMAILS FROM 4 LEGGED KIDS! 
  

  
 What is 4-Legged Kids? 
  

  
 We care for other people’s pets while they work or travel. Our clients trust us and we treat their fur family like our own! We are the largest pet sitting/ dog walking company in the STL area with a diverse team of 30 pet lovers providing over 1500 visits a month for hundreds of clients from St. Louis city limits out to St. Charles County. We provide an excellent opportunity for flexible and rewarding work. 
  

  
 What else do I need to know about joining the 4-Legged Kids Team? 
  

  
 We are looking for pet lovers who understand and accept the responsibilities we will place on them- our clients depend on us! We do not just play with cute kitties and puppies. We walk dogs when it's 90 degrees or below freezing out. You may have to carry a dog up and down stairs, lift food bags or search under every couch and bed for a cat. We clean up after them, feed them, administer medication, and go above and beyond for our clients. 
  

  
 This business is variable and schedules will vary from day to day. We realize working under these flexible and changing conditions can be difficult for some people. This is the nature of our industry and your dependability in this area is crucial. If you enjoy change and variety in the workplace then this will be perfect for you! 
  

  
 I can handle that! What else do I need to know? 
  

  
 You will receive ongoing education and training on various aspects of pet care and behavior.. You will be trained to handle the unexpected situations in pet care and admin support is a phone call away. 
  

  
 We are looking for mature, responsible people who are reliable, patient, and capable of independent action. We invest time and money into training our employees and require a minimum 6 month commitment… we would rather have you for years! We are #1 in the St. Louis area and look forward to finding out more about you! 
  

  
 
  

  
 
  

  
Powered by JazzHR

    </job>
    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Perfect job for pet overs]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
Bored with your current job? Love working with animals or always thought it was a dream job? Get out from behind the desk and get active with our amazing opportunities as a dog walker and pet sitter in St. Louis.
  

  

  

  
We are expanding our team and hiring two perfect people in the St. Louis area. Minimum 20 hours per week on a rotating schedule. Position has the potential to work into full time hours.
  

  
Required Skills and Experience:
  

  

  
+ Pet Care Experience - general knowledge of multiple species
  

  
+ Must have the ability to work with all breeds and sizes 
  

  
+ Must have at least 2 years recent experience in a demanding, detail-oriented position 
  

  
+ An eye for detail and a passion for completion
  

  
+ Ability to work independently with minimal to no supervision
  

  
+ Ability to safely lift 50 pounds and walk at a brisk pace for 30 min at a time, multiple times a day
  

  
+ Have your own functional and reliable transportation
  

  
+ Have a newer smartphone (iOS 9 or newer and Android 4.1 or newer) with data and a home computer with internet access 
  

  

  
Responsible for the following:
  

  

  
+ Providing care to animals (mainly dogs and cats) including walking, feeding, and other tasks as needed.
  

  
+ Communication with the central office
  

  
+ Providing client communications, education, and follow-up
  

  
+ Participates as a team member with company education, events/programs
  

  

  
We will not consider anyone for this position who is currently employed as a pet sitter/dog walker for another company, themselves, or as an online service provider.  Applicants should be over age 18 with a high school diploma or equivalent and able to clear a thorough background check.
  

  
BE SURE TO CHECK YOUR SPAM FOLDER FOR EMAILS FROM 4 LEGGED KIDS!

We clean up after them, feed them, administer medication, and go above and beyond for our clients.

This is the nature of our industry and your dependability in this area is crucial. If you enjoy change and variety in the workplace then this will be perfect for you!

 You will receive ongoing education and training on various aspects of pet care and behavior.. You will be trained to handle the unexpected situations in pet care and admin support is a phone call away.

    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[PT flexible pet care position]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
We are expanding our team and currently hiring additional part-time, flexible Pet Caregivers in the St Louis Mid County area.  This includes 63130, 63105, 63117, 63144, 63143, 63124, 63132, 63141, 63146. This position includes nights, weekends, and holidays and is a perfect extra income generator for someone who works a day job or is in school. Additional midday dog walking opportunities are available.
